name: Tapwai
description:
Made for the Wowie 4.0 Game Jam, "Collaborate with AI".

You play a platformer where the AI helps you beat it.

There are 6 hidden areas with a collectable.

Controls : 

Saying "Hey Listen" (And other phrases) allows you to say "Good Job" to the Ai or "Bad Job". By  Saying "Stop Listening"  (And other phrases) turns the voice off and allows for you to use "Q" for good tasks done and "E" for bad task done instead.

"W" also toggles voice controls

Currently no conformation on good job, bad job feedback.

"A" and "D" move left and right. "Space" is jump. "Shift" or "Ctrl" is sprint. "Esc" Pause.

Reset the AI memory in the main menu not settings menu

Don't forget to rate and leave feedback.

Credits to Raymond McLeod for working with me
